personal_info.name: Will Spiering
personal_info.headline: Senior UX/UI Engineer | Front-End Developer | User Experience Expert | Design-Dev Diplomat

summary.paragraph: Senior UX/UI Engineer and Front-End Developer with a proven track record in creating intuitive, responsive, and user-centric digital experiences. Expertise in bridging the gap between design and development, leveraging a diverse skill set including React, TypeScript, and SharePoint Framework. Proficient in working with and implementing various design systems, ensuring consistency and efficiency across projects. Demonstrated ability to lead projects from concept to completion, with a focus on enhancing user engagement and streamlining workflows. Highly adept at problem-solving, quick learning, and adapting to new technologies to drive innovation in web and application development.
bulleted: Senior UX/UI Engineer specializing in creating intuitive and responsive digital experiences
Expert in bridging design and development using React, TypeScript, and SharePoint Framework
Proficient in implementing and working with various design systems
Proven track record in leading projects from concept to completion
Strong focus on enhancing user engagement and streamlining workflows
Highly skilled in problem-solving and quick adaptation to new technologies
Passionate about driving innovation in web and application development

description.paragraph: Led the creation of an innovative SharePoint landing page tailored to individual user job roles. Developed UI for SharePoint Framework Web Parts using React, TypeScript, and Styled Components to boost user efficiency. Created a unified component library combining Microsoft Office design elements with brand identity to standardize development and maintain consistency in applications.
bulleted: Led the creation of an innovative SharePoint landing page tailored to individual user job roles
Developed UI for SharePoint Framework Web Parts using React, TypeScript, and Styled Components
Created a unified component library combining Microsoft Office design elements with brand identity
Improved user experiences across office productivity apps, leading to increased efficiency and satisfaction

description.paragraph: Redesigned forms and optimized user flows to enhance the user experience for applications tracking permits and government documents. Created intuitive wireframes and interactive prototypes using Figma, improving usability and efficiency. Collaborated with the development team to integrate design elements seamlessly, supporting front-end development tasks and maintaining design integrity.
bulleted: Redesigned forms and optimized user flows for applications tracking permits and government documents
Created intuitive wireframes and interactive prototypes using Figma
Collaborated with the development team to integrate design elements seamlessly

description.paragraph: Led UX/UI design and development for custom SharePoint, Teams, and Office 365 enhancements. Created high-fidelity mockups using Figma to simplify complex requirements into user-friendly interfaces. Developed robust SharePoint web parts with React, Styled Components, and the SharePoint Framework for seamless system integration. Ensured optimal user experience by implementing responsive design principles across devices and platforms.
bulleted: Led UX/UI design and development for custom SharePoint, Teams, and Office 365 enhancements
Created high-fidelity mockups using Figma to simplify complex requirements into user-friendly interfaces
Developed robust SharePoint web parts with React, Styled Components, and the SharePoint Framework

description.paragraph: Enhanced and maintained a large-scale e-commerce platform with Kentico CMS. Developed responsive pages using Bootstrap, custom forms, and advanced functionality in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and C#. Optimized customer journey and enhanced conversion rates through intuitive design for seamless user experiences.
bulleted: Enhanced and maintained a large-scale e-commerce platform with Kentico CMS
Developed responsive pages using Bootstrap, custom forms, and advanced functionality

description.paragraph: Expert in converting detailed Photoshop mockups into fully operational websites using an exclusive CMS. Utilized C# to craft dynamic, responsive websites following contemporary web standards and best practices. Proven track record of meticulously translating design ideas into flawless executions, guaranteeing client approval and maintaining brand coherence online.

description.paragraph: Developed responsive websites using Bootstrap and WordPress to meet client requirements. Designed user-friendly interfaces that blended aesthetics with functionality. Performed thorough testing for cross-browser compatibility, enhancing client satisfaction and engagement.
bulleted: Developed responsive websites using Bootstrap and WordPress
Designed user-friendly interfaces blending aesthetics with functionality

description.paragraph: Spearheaded the creation and maintenance of mobile-friendly, responsive websites for both the company and its diverse client base. Specialized in developing interactive, immersive experiences for trade show and museum exhibits, pushing the boundaries of digital engagement. Demonstrated versatility in adapting to various project requirements, consistently delivering high-quality, user-focused digital solutions.
